Package org.apache.shiro.guice.web

Class Summary
GuiceShiroFilter Shiro filter that is managed by and receives its filter chain configurations from Guice.
ShiroWebModule Sets up Shiro lifecycles within Guice, enables the injecting of Shiro objects, and binds a default WebSecurityManager, SecurityManager and SessionManager.
